trans-unit.source: Holds an <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback"></xref> delegate instance, plus the method's inputs; also supplies the method's parameters.

During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization derived from the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader> class.
During this process, the infrastructure generates methods that implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback> delegate.
Additionally, it instantiates <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup> class objects to store the fix-up methods along with their inputs.
The infrastructure does so for SOAP-encoded arrays or SOAP-encoded, multireferenced elements whose data types, in either case, map to .NET Framework collections or enumerations.
Then, as necessary, the methods are invoked during deserialization to fill in array items or multireferenced objects.
Do not directly instantiate <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback> or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup>.
SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup"></xref> class with parameters for a callback method.

Do not directly create and instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup> class or the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback> delegate.
A collection into which the callback method copies the collection items array.
A method that instantiates the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback"></xref> delegate.
An array into which the callback method copies a collection.
Gets the callback method that instantiates the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback"></xref> delegate.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback"></xref> delegate that points to the callback method.
Gets the object collection for the callback method.

The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup.Collection%2A> property gets the collection into which the method that implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback> delegate copies the array that is obtained through the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup.CollectionItems%2A> property.
The collection that is used for the fixup.
Gets the array into which the callback method copies a collection.

The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup.CollectionItems%2A> property gets the array that the method that implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback> delegate copies into the collection object that is obtained through the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup.Collection%2A> property.
The array into which the callback method copies a collection.
